## Chess.getComment() method

Retrieve the comment for the current position, if it exists.

```js
const chess = new Chess()

chess.loadPgn("1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Bc5 {giuoco piano} *")

chess.getComment()
// -> "giuoco piano"

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getComment(): string;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

string
